title: Am I the only one who thinks JENNIE is BLACKPINKS ACE? - Quora

response.answer_text: there's like, 6B+ people on earth so obviously you're not the only one- jokes aside no, i think jennie is an ace too, the only one at it. rapping ✔ (main rapper) singing ✔ (lead vocal?) dancing ✔ (dancer or lead) lisa could be an ace but we haven't seen her singing potential that much, rapping and 100% dancing is a yes though. rosé and jisoo are really talented dancers and singers but their rapping? maybe a few years or months for jisoo and rosé to get better at rapping. maybe even a few months because rosé is a fast learner (idk about jisoo) rosé rapping Lisa's part in hylt and acoustic stage and manyyy more. i think jisoo rapped a bit of jennies part in du du ddu too.
